translation.en: Harper, just please get your shoes on. Please.
translation.zh: 哈珀 拜托快把鞋穿上 乖

translation.en: Hey, do you know what we're doing today?
translation.zh: 嘿 你知道我们今天要做什么吗？

translation.en: We're going on an adventure together.
We're going to get on a boat. We're gonna sail across the sea to a place
translation.zh: 我们要去坐船 漂洋过海去一个地方

translation.en: where it's always sunny and you can eat ice cream every day.
translation.zh:
那里阳光明媚
你每天都可以吃冰淇淋
很好 唯一的问题是

translation.en: we need to leave now. Okay?
translation.zh: 我们现在就得离开 好吗？

translation.en: [whispers] Because there's a dragon out there.
And if we make any noise, or if we're too slow, the dragon will eat us. Okay?
translation.zh:
如果我们发出任何声响 或者我们
动作太慢 龙就会把我们吃掉 懂吗？

translation.en: So are you going to put your shoes on for me?
translation.zh: 所以你要为我把鞋穿上吗？

translation.en: Okay, Harper. I think you just have to walk. Is that all right?
translation.zh:
好了 哈珀
你可能得自己走了 可以吗？

translation.en: -[man] It's the blue fishing trawler. -[woman] Right.
translation.zh:
-那边那艘蓝色的拖网渔船
-好的

translation.en: [man] Right, young lady. In you go.
translation.zh: 好了 小妹妹 上去吧

translation.en: Harper's been practicing this song all week.
translation.zh: 哈珀整个星期都在练习这首歌

translation.en: It's been driving me and Jordi mad.
translation.zh: 我和乔迪都快被逼疯了

translation.en: There was a woman in Germany who got a song stuck in her head for four years.
translation.zh:
德国有个女人
她被一首歌洗脑了四年

translation.en: -Actually, I think maybe it was hiccups. -It's an urban myth.
translation.zh: 我觉得是打嗝 这是个都市传说

translation.en: Well, only until the big interview on Tuesday.
translation.zh: 周二的重要面试后就不是了

translation.en: I just hope you remember us little people when you're swanning about the staff room.
translation.zh:
希望你神气地在员工休息室
走来走去时 还记得我们这些小人物

translation.en: Oh, of course I will, uh…

translation.zh: 不过 她很是乐在其中

translation.en: Yeah. It's good. I think she's finally starting to fit in here.
translation.zh:
是啊 这样很好
我想她终于开始适应这里了

translation.en: I'm very happy we ended up in Barcelona.
translation.zh: 我非常高兴我们最终来到了巴塞罗纳

translation.en: Plus, she gets to be a planet.
translation.zh: 而且她还能演一颗行星

translation.en: Well, she's… she's Pluto, isn't she?
translation.zh: 她是…她是冥王星 对吧？

-够了！
-安东尼奥 你好讨厌！

translation.en: So are you going to tell me?
I mean, there's got to be a reason.
Getting kicked out of the musical.
It's just, you seemed pretty vocal before.
translation.zh: 你以前感觉挺爱说话的

translation.en: I've got to go to the toilet.
[woman in Catalan] The supermarket will close in two minutes.
translation.zh: 超市将在两分钟后关门

translation.en: Don't miss our special three for two offer in frozen foods.
translation.zh:
不要错过
冷冻食品的买二赠一特别优惠

translation.en: So, you know, we're closing soon to do inventory.
translation.zh: 我们马上就要打烊清点存货了

translation.en: [in English] Oh, sorry my Catalan is very bad. Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我的加泰罗尼亚语很糟糕 抱歉

translation.en: FYI, when you throw a punch, you need to keep your fist tight.
translation.zh:
顺便说一句
出拳的时候你得把拳头握紧

translation.en: Otherwise, you'll damage your knuckles and wrists.
Of course, all of this is irrelevant
translation.zh: 当然 这些都无关紧要

translation.en: 'cause you're never going to hit anyone again, are you?
translation.zh: 因为你不会再打任何人了 对吧？

translation.en: He asked where my white stick was.
translation.zh: 他问我的盲人杖在哪里

translation.en: Said I needed to stay at the back of the stage 'cause…
translation.zh: 说我得待在后台 因为…
安东尼奥是有点吴昂 波啊 的安

translation.en: You're not meant to say the word. That's the point of spelling it out.
translation.zh:
你不该把这个词说出来的
读拼音就是为了这个

translation.en: We don't solve our problems with violence.
translation.zh: 我们不能用暴力解决问题

translation.en: Are you going to tell Jordi?
You can call him Dad, you know.
translation.zh: 要知道 你可以叫他爸爸的

translation.en: Mmm, I know, I just like the name Jordi.
translation.zh: 我知道 我只是喜欢“乔迪”这个名字

translation.en: Yeah, but I still think he prefers for you to call him Dad.
translation.zh:
是 但我还是觉得
他更喜欢你叫他爸爸

translation.en: [woman] I thought I told you, eyes on the ground! Shut the fuck up!
translation.zh: 我想我已经说过了 低头！闭嘴！

translation.en: I told you to keep moving.
[woman in Catalan] Nurse Garcia, please contact Urology.
translation.zh: 加西亚护士 请联系泌尿科

translation.en: -[in English] Are you okay? -[Erin] It's okay.
translation.zh:
-你没事吧？
-没事 -他们说…
-这些不是我的血

translation.en: Okay, let's get you to a room. Yeah?
translation.zh: 好了 我带你们去找个房间 好吗？

translation.en: Bruised ribs, hip contusion, minor concussions.
translation.zh: 肋骨擦伤 臀部挫伤 轻微脑震荡

translation.en: [doctor] All things considered, it could have been worse.
translation.zh: 总而言之 情况本会更糟的

translation.en: You and Harper are good to go.
[woman in Catalan] We remind you smoking is not permitted in this hospital.
translation.zh: 友情提示 本院禁止吸烟

translation.en: Smoking is allowed in designated smoking areas.
translation.zh: 如有需要 可以前往指定的吸烟区

translation.en: [in English] So? [Erin] I'm all right. Just a bit of bruising.
translation.zh:
-怎么样？
-我没事 只是稍微有些擦伤

translation.en: What happened was pretty scary. It's okay not to be okay.
translation.zh: 刚刚的事非常可怕 害怕也没关系的

translation.en: Hey, I spotted a machine down the hall.
translation.zh: 嘿 我在走廊看到一台机器

translation.en: Why don't you get yourself a snack and a fizzy drink?
translation.zh: 你自己去买点零食和汽水？

translation.en: You said I'm not allowed any snacks or fizzy drinks after six o'clock.
translation.zh: 你说过六点前我不可以吃这些的

translation.en: -I think we can make an exception. -Yeah.
[woman in Catalan] Smoking is allowed in designated smoking areas,
translation.zh: 如有需要 可以前往指定的吸烟区

translation.en: at the canteen exit, and at the Emergency entrances.
translation.zh: 吸烟区在食堂出口与紧急入口处

translation.en: [in English] As a nurse, they train you to act calm and professional.
translation.zh:
身为护士
他们会训练你保持冷静和专业

translation.en: Ah, good, 'cause inside I'm completely freaking out.
translation.zh: 很好 因为我内心慌得不行

-好的
-嗯 他在重症监护室里

translation.en: He lost a lot of blood, though, so he might not make it through the night.
translation.zh: 他流了很多血 所以可能撑不过今晚

translation.en: Erin, this is not your fault.
But let me see what I can do.
translation.zh: 不过 我看能不能想想办法
我们不能待太久 好吗？

translation.en: Shit. I… I forgot to tell Harper where we were going.
translation.zh:
糟糕 我忘了
告诉哈珀我们要去哪儿了

translation.en: It's you, Kate. It's really you.
translation.zh: 是你 凯特…真的是你

translation.en: [man in Catalan] Emergency. All available doctors report to room 124.
translation.zh: 紧急情况 所有医生请到124室 来 坐在这里
就像哈珀说的 一半一半吧

translation.en: Well, you know, they have people at the hospital, uh, counselors.
translation.zh: 要知道 医院里有辅导师

translation.en: Specialists who deal with post-traumatic situations.
translation.zh: 处理创伤后情况的专家

translation.en: Okay. It is going to work. But I still think that we should talk
translation.zh:
好吧 会成功的
但我还是觉得我们应该

translation.en: That's why I'm trying to distract you.
translation.zh: 所以我才想分散你的注意力

translation.en: [Jordi] There you go. Three, two, one.
translation.zh: 好了 三 二 一

translation.en: Pour some more in. Come on.
-[Harper] Can I flip it again? -[Jordi] Of course.
But what you said wasn't very nice.
translation.zh: 但你那样说也不太友善

translation.en: I was hoping I could speak to your parents.
translation.zh: 我希望能和你爸妈聊聊

translation.en: Dad's on a business trip. Mum's got a tennis lesson. She's round the back.
translation.zh:
我爸去出差了
妈妈去上网球课 就快回来了

translation.en: I know. We're coming to her party tonight. It's going to be fun!
translation.zh:
我知道 我们今晚要去
参加她的派对 一定会很好玩！

translation.en: -Have you got it fixed yet? -[Jordi] Yeah.
Huh? No. Okay, no, no. No, no.
That is… a work in progress.
Why don't you take the day off?
Oh, I can't. Not with this job review coming up. I need to show my face.
translation.zh:
不行 工作评估
马上就要开始了 我得去露露脸

translation.en: Well, can you promise, at least, to not get involved in any armed robberies?
translation.zh:
你能答应我
不会卷入任何持械抢劫案中吗？

translation.en: I want to say yes… Ears.
Harp, we're going to be late. Move it!
translation.zh: 我们要迟到了 快点！

translation.en: [in English] Wow. Almost made it into your house.
translation.zh: 哇 差点就到你家了

translation.en: I was going to call around last night.
translation.zh: 我昨晚本来打算打电话给你的

translation.en: -I heard what happened at the supermarket. -Oh, we're fine. Don't worry about it.
translation.zh:
-我听说了超市的事
-我们没事 不用担心

translation.en: We'll need to interview you today or tomorrow.
translation.zh: 今天或明天 我们需要找你问话

translation.en: I'll be on the investigating team, so don't worry about it.
translation.zh: 调查小组里会有我 所以不用担心

translation.en: There's not much to say, but okay, sure.
translation.zh: 我没什么好说的 不过好的 当然

translation.en: -Hey, if you want coffee, Jordi made some. -Okay. Thank you.
translation.zh:
-如果你想喝咖啡 乔迪冲好了
-好的 谢谢

translation.en: Why does he sleep in his car?
You know how Emilio's wife doesn't live there anymore?
translation.zh:
你知道他老婆
已经不再住在那里了吧？

translation.en: Well, he misses her a lot, so he'd rather sleep in the car than an empty bed.
translation.zh:
他很想她 所以他宁愿睡在车上
也不愿睡在空荡荡的床上

translation.en: [Emilio in Spanish] Hey, buddy, give me a coffee.
translation.zh: 嘿 兄弟 给我来杯咖啡

translation.en: [Erin in English] You don't have to be here if you're not ready yet.
translation.zh:
嘿 如果你还没准备好
你不必来这儿的

translation.en: -I can take you home. -[Harper] I'm fine.
Oh, uh, see you later, Mum.
We are so glad you are okay.
Is Harper okay? We were so worried.
translation.zh: 哈珀没事吧？我们担心死了

translation.en: So… there's bad news and good news.
translation.zh: 那么…现在有个坏消息和一个好消息

translation.en: So the bad news is Penelope Reyna's lodged a formal complaint
translation.zh:
坏消息是
佩内洛普·雷纳提出了正式的投诉

translation.en: to have Harper removed from the school.
She's very upset about what happened to her son.
translation.zh: 她对她儿子的遭遇很生气

translation.en: She claims Harper is a psychopath.
Olivia, you do know Antonio was making fun of her eye problem.

translation.zh: 这算是个反社会人士咯？

translation.en: Anyway, people tell me there's a difference, but tomato, tomato.
translation.zh:
大家说这二者是有区别的
但也就大同小异了

translation.en: I mean, will she succeed or what do I do?
translation.zh: 她会成功还是…我该怎么办？
对方是佩内洛普 所以…

translation.en: The good news. The good news is, well, you got attacked in a supermarket.
translation.zh:
好消息 好消息是
你在超市遭遇了袭击

translation.en: How is that good news, Olivia?
Before you were some faceless drone, a totally forgettable substitute teacher,
translation.zh:
以前你是个无名小卒
一个容易被人遗忘的代课老师

translation.en: but now you are a hero who stopped a robbery
translation.zh: 但现在 你成了阻止罪案发生的英雄

translation.en: and definitely deserves that full-time contract.
translation.zh: 你绝对值得一份全职合同

translation.en: Plus, you've got your photo in the paper.
translation.zh: 你绝对值得一份全职合同 而且 报纸上登了你的照片

translation.en: Don't worry. You look great. It's a lovely photo.
translation.zh: 别担心 你看起来很漂亮 照片很棒

translation.en: -[bell rings] -Yeah, okay. I need to go.
translation.zh: 别担心 你看起来很漂亮 照片很棒 好吧 我得走了

translation.en: I'm Mrs. Carter. I'll be filling in for Mr. Luis today.
translation.zh:
我是卡特老师
今天会由我来代替路易斯老师
刚刚是个意外 老师

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -[Emilio] I was worried.
translation.zh:
-你怎么来这儿了？
-我有点担心

translation.en: Look, your interview is scheduled for two o'clock tomorrow.
translation.zh: 你的询问安排在明天两点

translation.en: Sant Àngel station. You're speaking to Inspector Tabarez.
translation.zh:
圣安格尔分局
你会接受塔巴雷斯督察的询问

translation.en: Yeah, okay. But did you need to come all the way here to tell me that?
translation.zh:
好的 但你有必要
专门来这儿告诉我吗？

translation.en: No, but I want to give you my take on the situation.
translation.zh:
没有 但我想跟你说说
我对这种情势的看法

translation.en: They knew Thursday was the payroll.
translation.zh: 他们知道周四是发薪日

translation.en: They came at the end of the day, disabled security cameras except…
translation.zh:
他们在下班后行动
破坏了监控摄像头 不过…

translation.en: An older model on a different circuit.
translation.zh: 另一条线路上的旧机器

translation.en: Yeah, well, you hear about these things, don't you?
translation.zh: 你听说过这类事件 对吧？

translation.en: A woman's child is being trapped under a car,
translation.zh: 一个女人的孩子被压在了车下

translation.en: and she finds the strength to
Or to stab someone in the legs twice with a cake tester
translation.zh:
或者用蛋糕测试器
连续两次刺中别人的双腿

translation.en: I didn't shoot anyone. The gun just went off.
translation.zh: 我没有对任何人开枪 枪走火了

-好吧
-听着 我现在是有麻烦了吗？

translation.en: No, no, of course not. I mean…
translation.zh: 没有 当然不是 我是说…

translation.en: But my boss is a bloodhound,
translation.zh: 但我的老板会死咬不放

translation.en: and he'll be all over this footage, and maybe to him, this will look a little different,
translation.zh:
他会认真研究这段录像
他可能会稍微有一些不同的看法

translation.en: so if there's anything you need to tell me, now would be--
translation.zh:
所以如果你有什么
需要告诉我的 现在会是…

translation.en: Only that you're being a bit of a dick right now, okay?
translation.zh: 我只想说你稍微有点扯淡

translation.en: [sighs] Just be careful. There were two of them at the supermarket.
translation.zh: 小心点 超市里有两个匪徒

translation.en: One's dead but the other one… the other one is still out there.
translation.zh: 一个死了 但另一个还逍遥法外

translation.en: -I'll see you at the party. -Yeah, okay. See you later.
Go and find Antonio and say hello to him.
translation.zh: 去找安东尼奥 跟他打声招呼

translation.en: Penelope's going to love that, someone else being the center of attention.
translation.zh:
佩内洛普会喜欢这样的
另外一个人成为了焦点

translation.en: Yeah, maybe I should, I don't know, wish her a happy birthday.
translation.zh:
是啊 我不知道
也许我应该去祝她生日快乐

translation.en: -Yeah. -And we will go find the bar.
Yeah, that's an even better idea.
My mum says I've got to apologize to you.
translation.zh: 我妈妈说我必须向你道歉

translation.en: If you don't shake my hand, I'm going to stab your eyes out.
translation.zh:
如果你不跟我握手
我会把你眼珠子挖出来

translation.en: Mmm, thank you, Antonio. You look very smart.
translation.zh: 谢谢 安东尼奥 你看起来非常犀利

translation.en: I'm gonna go get some ice cream now.
translation.zh: 现在我要去吃冰淇淋了

translation.en: Harper's very sorry about what happened and I'm sorry too.
translation.zh:
哈珀对发生的事深感抱歉
我也非常抱歉

translation.en: Thank you, Erin. That means a lot.
translation.zh: 谢谢 这对我意义重大

translation.en: Okay, she's… It's been a lot.
I know, and it breaks my heart.
translation.zh: 我知道 这让我很难过

translation.en: But the other children need to be protected from her.
translation.zh:
但其他孩子
需要得到保护 免遭她的伤害

translation.en: Seriously? She's… she's not a danger to anyone.
translation.zh: 真的吗？她没有威胁到任何人

translation.en: She doesn't have to be kicked out of school. I can see where she gets her temper from.
translation.zh:
-你们犯不着开除她
-我知道她的脾气是哪儿来的了

translation.en: But I was hoping we could sort this ourselves, as neighbors.
translation.zh:
但作为邻居 我希望
我们能自己解决这件事情

translation.en: We just live near each other.
translation.zh: 我们只不过住得比较近而已

translation.en: You think you're better than everyone else?
translation.zh: 你觉得自己比其他人优秀吗？

translation.en: You have a giant, naked ice sculpture of yourself. Come on.
translation.zh: 你给自己做了个超大的裸体冰雕

translation.en: That was a gift of love from my husband.
translation.zh: 那是我丈夫送我的礼物

translation.en: I will try my best to be a better neighbor,
translation.zh: 我会尽力成为一个更好的邻居

translation.en: if that's what you want, but please don't…
translation.zh: 如果你希望这样的话 但请不要…

translation.en: don't get Harper expelled. She needs this.
translation.zh: 别让学校开除哈珀 她需要这个

translation.en: Now move along. You're spoiling the view.
translation.zh: 现在走开吧 你太煞风景了

translation.en: Oh, no. No, no, no, no, no.
We weren't arguing. I was just asking her the name of her ice sculptor.
translation.zh:
我们没有吵架
我就是去问问她冰雕的名字

translation.en: You never know when you're going to need one.
translation.zh: 你永远不知道自己何时会需要

translation.en: It was quite impressive, I have to admit.
translation.zh: 必须承认 它真的很棒

translation.en: Do you think she has a special guy for that?
translation.zh: 你觉得她有特别的门路吗？

translation.en: Well, she didn't want to tell me.
I turned the lights off before we left.
translation.zh: 我们走之前 我把灯关了的

translation.en: Good afternoon, Mrs. Carter. I'm Inspector Tabarez. Let's get started.
translation.zh:
下午好 卡特女士
我是塔巴雷斯督察 我们开始吧

translation.en: In Strasbourg, you were a private tutor to an American family.
translation.zh:
在斯特拉斯堡时
您是一个美国家庭的私人家教？

translation.en: Yes, the Palmers. They had two children, Lisa and Mark.
translation.zh:
是的 帕尔梅家
他们有两个孩子 丽莎和马克

translation.en: And when you started as a substitute at St. Joseph's International,
translation.zh:
您开始在
圣约瑟夫国际学校当代课老师时

translation.en: this Palmer family were provided as reference.
translation.zh: 帕尔梅家被列为你的推荐人

translation.en: [Tabarez] The phone number that you gave for them is no longer in use.
translation.zh:
您所提供的他们的电话号码
已经打不通了

translation.en: No, there is no trace of any such family in Strasbourg at that time.
translation.zh:
不 在斯特拉斯堡
没有这家人的任何记录

translation.en: I… I don't know what to tell you. They were there and…
translation.zh:
我不知道该怎么跟您说
他们在那儿而且…

translation.en: [Tabarez] Your husband, Jordi Collantes, is a nurse at Hospital General?
translation.zh:
您丈夫乔迪·科朗特
是综合医院的护士

translation.en: He took you to the ICU to see the injured man from the supermarket?
translation.zh:
他带您去重症监护室
看了超市的那个男人？

translation.en: [Erin] Yes, I felt bad about what happened.
translation.zh: 是的 我对发生的事感到很遗憾

translation.en: You felt bad about the person who tried to kill you?
translation.zh: 您对那个想杀了您的人感到遗憾？

translation.en: I felt bad about what happened. Yes.
translation.zh: 我对发生的事感到很遗憾 是的

translation.en: [Tabarez] And was your husband with you when this man suffered his heart attack?
translation.zh:
这个人心脏病发的时候
您的丈夫和您在一起吗？

translation.en: No, I asked him to go check on our daughter, Harper.
translation.zh: 不在 我让他去照看我们的女儿了

translation.en: Oh, so you were alone with the deceased?
translation.zh: 所以当时只有您和死者？

translation.en: [Erin] Well, Jordi was only gone for a minute
and there was a policeman outside the room the whole time.
translation.zh: 而且病房外面一直都有警察

translation.en: Did you know that asphyxiation can bring on a cardiac arrest?
translation.zh: 您知道窒息会导致心脏骤停吗？

translation.en: [Tabarez] So maybe this man died due to complications from his gunshot wound,
translation.zh: 所以这个人也许是死于枪伤并发症

translation.en: or maybe someone took a pillow and with their hands…
translation.zh: 也可能是有人拿了一个枕头…

translation.en: Hold on. I've done nothing wrong.
translation.zh: 等等 我没有做错任何事

translation.en: [Tabarez] That is not for you to decide.
Listen. I don't give a fuck what you think the CCTV footage shows you, okay?
translation.zh:
听着 我他妈才不在乎
你对监控录像有什么看法 好吗？

translation.en: Does it show my daughter, terrified?
translation.zh: 你看到我女儿惊慌失措了吗？

translation.en: Hiding from the man with the fucking gun?
translation.zh: 躲避一个拿着枪的男人？

translation.en: There is no footage from the supermarket.
All the cameras had been turned off.
translation.zh: 所有的摄像头都被关闭了

translation.en: I'm sorry. That must make your job a lot harder.
translation.zh:
对不起 这一定
让你们的工作更加困难了

translation.en: And also, sorry for all the swearing.
translation.zh: 我也为刚才说脏话道歉

translation.en: [in Spanish] Okay. I'll call you in a second. Sorry.
translation.zh: 好的 我一会儿打给你 抱歉 谢谢

translation.en: Apparently there was no supermarket footage.
translation.zh: 显然超市的录像并不存在

translation.en: Maybe there was a problem with that other camera after all.
translation.zh: 也许后来那个摄像头出问题了

translation.en: What the hell were you thinking?
I thought I was helping you.
And what if someone finds out, huh?
Do you know what that makes me look like? Like I've got something to hide.
translation.zh:
你知道那会让我看起来像什么吗？
好像我在隐瞒什么事一样

translation.en: [Emilio] I thought it'd be easier this way.
translation.zh: 我以为这样会比较容易

translation.en: Emilio, I didn't ask for your help. I didn't ask you to steal camera footage.
translation.zh:
埃米利奥 我没让你帮我
没让你去偷监控录像

translation.en: I didn't ask for any of this.

translation.zh: 抱歉 我没事 只是…

translation.en: Sometimes I wonder if we made a mistake in coming here.
translation.zh:
有时候我会想
我们来这儿是不是个错误

translation.en: -You left your glasses in the car. -[Harper] I don't care.
translation.zh:
-你把眼镜落在车上了
-我不在乎

translation.en: The sun is bad for your eyes.
Good. I want to go blind. I'm bored of waiting.
translation.zh: 太好了 我希望变瞎 我等得不耐烦了

translation.en: I'm not hurting you. I'm trying to protect you.
translation.zh: 我不想伤害你 我是想保护你

translation.en: I don't want to go. I like it here.
translation.zh: 我不想离开 我喜欢这里

translation.en: Do you remember when we first moved here?
translation.zh: 你还记得我们刚搬到这里时吗？

translation.en: And I couldn't keep you out of the water.
translation.zh: 我都没办法让你从水里出来

translation.en: You wanted to go to the beach every day.
You'd wake us up at 6:00 a.m. with your costume on.
translation.zh: 早上六点 你就会穿戴好把我们叫醒

translation.en: And I had to stop because the sun hurts my eyes.
translation.zh:
但我不得不放弃
因为阳光会损伤我的眼睛

translation.en: Well, that's why you need to wear your special glasses.
translation.zh: 所以你才需要戴着你的特制眼镜啊

translation.en: Harp, you can go inside the house. I'm just…
translation.zh: 小哈 你可以先回家去

translation.en: I'm just going to have a quick chat with Penelope.
Of course not. No, she doesn't.
translation.zh: 当然不是 她不讨厌你

translation.en: I was just starting to enjoy school.
Please don't let her kick me out.
Listen, she's not going to, okay?
translation.zh: 听着 她不会的 好吗？

translation.en: Have you dropped your complaint against Harper yet?
translation.zh: 你放弃对哈珀的投诉了吗？

translation.en: I'm going to ask you politely one last time.
translation.zh: 我再礼貌地最后一次请求你
不的意思就是不 艾琳

translation.en: having sex with your tennis coach.

translation.zh:
-偷拍别人
-是你先找我家人麻烦的

translation.en: Your daughter broke my son's teeth. [Erin] I'm not saying this is my finest hour, okay?
translation.zh:
-你女儿打断了我儿子的牙齿
-我并不以此为傲

translation.en: But if you don't back down,
I have no choice. I'll send the video to your husband.
translation.zh: 我会把视频发给你丈夫

translation.en: he phoned the morning of my birthday,
translation.zh: 我生日那天早上他打了电话来

translation.en: said he wasn't able to make it home.
When I told him I was upset, he said,
translation.zh: 我跟他说我不开心时 他说

translation.en: he'd paid for the fucking party, what more did I want?
translation.zh:
他已经为派对买单了
我还想要什么？

translation.en: I'm sorry to hear that, um…
And I'm not judging you. I'm just…
translation.zh: 我不是对你品头论足 我只是…

translation.en: I see no reason why we can't sort this out between us.
translation.zh: 我觉得这件事我们可以私下解决

translation.en: What you've done here, Erin, it was a mistake.
translation.zh: 艾琳 你这么做是错的

translation.en: [Jordi] Dinner is served. How hungry are you?
translation.zh: 晚餐准备好了 你有多饿？

translation.en: [Jodi] Okay, I will give you a kind-of-hungry portion. Hey.
translation.zh: 好吧 那我就给你“有点饿”的分量

translation.en: Here we go. We need to eat fast
translation.zh: 好了 我们得吃快点

translation.en: if we're going to make it to Harper's musical on time.
translation.zh: 这样才赶得上哈珀的音乐剧

translation.en: They just had too many people or something.
I broke two of Antonio's teeth. Now Mrs. Reyna's trying to expel me.
translation.zh:
我把安东尼奥的两颗牙齿打断了
雷纳太太现在想把我开除
好吧 放轻松 这…

translation.en: I'm sorry. I should've said something. Yeah.
translation.zh: 对不起 我应该告诉你的

translation.en: Can we talk about this later? I really need to get changed.
translation.zh:
我们可以晚点再谈这件事吗？
我真的得去换衣服了

translation.en: [Jordi] Harp, you can eat in front of the TV.
translation.zh: 小哈 你可以去电视机前吃

translation.en: Um, so, you know, Penelope trying to get our daughter kicked out of school,
translation.zh:
我说 佩内洛普
要让学校开除我们的女儿

translation.en: it's kind of a big deal.
You could have died the other night.
translation.zh: 那天晚上你可能会死的

translation.en: But you're acting like it was normal.
translation.zh: 但你表现得好像一切很正常似的

translation.en: [Jordi] When did you start keeping things from me and shutting me out?
translation.zh:
你什么时候开始
对我有所隐瞒 把我拒之门外了？

translation.en: [Olivia] Enjoy the show. It's just through this way.
translation.zh: 看剧愉快 从这里过去就好

translation.en: I had a fight with Jordi.
I just don't know how you do it.
translation.zh: 我不知道你是如何做到的

translation.en: You have twice as many kids and responsibilities,
translation.zh: 你的孩子和责任是我的两倍

translation.en: but you're always on time, always on form.
translation.zh: 但你总能守时 总能保持最佳状态

translation.en: I'm so high right now, this is basically an out-of-body experience.
translation.zh:
我现在非常兴奋
这基本上是一种超脱肉体的感受

translation.en: You're right where you're meant to be.
translation.zh: 你就在你应该在的地方

translation.en: Fuck's sake, we're missing it. Come on. Go, go, go, go, go, go, go.
translation.zh: 该死 我们要错过了 快走

translation.en: ♪ The stars hanging over your head ♪
♪ The sun burning brightly in red ♪
♪ It all started with a bang ♪
-♪ It started with a bang… ♪ -Hey, I'll be back in one minute.
translation.zh: 始于一场爆炸 嘿 我马上就回来

translation.en: If you're looking for the restroom, they're back towards the entrance hall.
translation.zh:
如果你想找洗手间
在入口大厅的后面

translation.en: I think you should leave before I call security.
translation.zh: 我想你最好还是在我叫保安前出去吧

translation.en: You know, I almost didn't believe it.
When I saw you in the supermarket, I thought,
translation.zh:
我在超市看到你时
我想 是啊 这一定是…

translation.en: "Ah, it must be like a… trick of the light. Must be a mistake."
translation.zh:
我在超市看到你时
我想 是啊 这一定是… 灯光的影响 肯定是认错了

translation.en: I think you've mistaken me for someone else.

translation.zh: 你他妈看着我 凯特！

translation.en: Yeah, I wasn't planning on staying, Kate.
translation.zh: 是啊 我本来没打算要留下来 凯特

translation.en: -But I know you have it. -No, I don't.
translation.zh:
-但我知道东西在你手上
-不 我没拿

translation.en: Look at what I've been reduced to.
translation.zh: 你看看我堕落成什么样了

translation.en: I'm holding up fucking supermarkets. That's one step above purse snatching!
translation.zh:
我在抢劫超市
这也就比抢钱包好一点点！

translation.en: And it's all because of what you did.
Just give it to me. Then I'm gone. No one else needs to know you're here.
translation.zh:
把它给我 然后我就会离开
没人需要知道你在这里

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah. Yeah. I want to believe that.
translation.zh: 是啊 我也想相信这话

translation.en: But it's you, so I don't.
translation.zh: 但话是你说的 所以我不信
反正我从来都不喜欢你

translation.en: I'm not going to hurt the kid, but I'll have to take her with me.
translation.zh:
我不会伤害那孩子
但我必须带她一起走

translation.en: Otherwise, they won't believe me. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 否则他们是不会相信我的 对不起

translation.en: She's the woman from the supermarket.

translation.zh: 你警告过我的 不是吗？

translation.en: We've got maybe 15 minutes to tidy up and get the fucking body out of here.
translation.zh:
我们有15分钟的时间打扫干净
然后把这该死的尸体弄出去

translation.en: ♪ We share the same solar system… ♪
♪ We all share the same intergalactic ♪
-Do you want to say a few words? -What?
I meant a prayer or something.
'Cause you are the wife of my best friend.
translation.zh: 因为你是我铁哥们儿的妻子
我们基本上就是一家人

translation.en: I've got mixed up with some bad people.
translation.zh: 我和一些坏人搅在了一起

translation.en: So maybe I help you and then you help me.
translation.zh: 所以 也许我帮了你 你也能帮帮我
埃米利奥 我是个老师

translation.en: Mrs. Carter in the classroom with a dead body.
translation.zh: 卡特老师和一具尸体在教室里

translation.en: What if I don't want to help you?
[woman] I'm getting a bad feeling about this.
And when I get a bad feeling, I just…
translation.zh: 当我有不祥的预感时 我就会…

translation.en: [Harper] I think it might be burnt.
[Jordi] How about I cook and you flip, yeah?
translation.zh: 不如我来做 你来翻面 好吗？
